> <OLD>
>
> Hydras smirked  and said "This willbe... Interesting"
>
> He jumped to aside and all took his weapons, he started to shot against
> Megastorm

<NEW>

MEGASTORM frowned, "Interesting?" He waved his hand dissmissively as
he dodged to one side avoiding HYDRAS' attacks, his armored form more
agile than it first may have appeared.

"I will show you interesting!" MEGASTORM said as he leaped up and
swung around as he kicked at HYDRAS, his movements disciplined and
well practiced!

(TAG)

- Preston
